knimeNode.name: Dummy Input (Comp.)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Placeholder quickform input node that allows the user to force a break in the wizard execution.

intro.p: Placeholder quickform input node that allows the user to force a break in the wizard execution. This can be useful in the webportal execution when the user should first see some intermediate output on one page without being required to enter additional settings.

ports.outPort: Static output of the input/workflow variables.
